name: Godrej Expert Rich Creme Hair Colour Burgundy
description:
Current Promotional Period: 13-Feb-2025 To 28-Feb-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities  * Godrej Expert Rich Crème is enriched with the goodness of aloe vera which keeps your hair incredibly soft and shiny. The goodness of its ingredients lends you that extra ‘care’ only an expert can give. * The presence of ammonia in your hair color can be harmful to your hair. Godrej Expert Rich Creme is an ammonia-free hair color that keeps your hair strong, is safe to use, and can lend beautiful, long-lasting color to your tresses. * For those who love creme hair color. Now do applications including root touch-ups in the comfort of your home with just a single pack. Getting long-lasting beautiful colors has become simpler! * The pack has one unit of creme (20g) and one unit of developer (20 ml).

name: Farmer's Gold Henna (Mehendi) Powder
description:
Mehndi Powder increases hair density. Henna Powder prevents the roughness of hair and split ends. Henna Powder cures dandruff.

name: HairCode Egypt Herbal Powder Hair Color (Black) 5 gm
description:
Hair Code Egypt Herbal Hair Color is a natural black color with the nourishment of Hibiscus, Amla & Henna. It will give you the natural black color within just 30 minutes. It is made from Halal Ingredients.   Caution   • Product should not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows, as it may cause serious damage to eyes. Rinse eyes immediately with plenty of water. If product meets eyes. If persistent irritation occurs consult a doctor.   • Do not use if you have already experienced and allergic reaction to a hair colour or if scalp is score has any cuts or abrasion or is in diseased condition.   • For external use only. Do not inhale ort ingest.   • Keep away from reach of children.   • Store in dry & dark place  Skin Sensitive   • Every time do a sensitively test before 48 hours of use.   • Mix the powder with one or two drops of water and apply it on any clean and dry part on back of the ear and let it dry.   • Wash the color with soap & water and carefully observe if any change occurs for 48 hours.      Barcode: No Barcodes in Sachet

name: Bigen Hair Color & Conditioner (Light Brown)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Japan. Color Code-885Bigen Hair Color & Conditioner (Light Brown) provides a soft, radiant light brown shade, perfect for enhancing your hair’s natural beauty while fully covering gray hair. Its ammonia-free formula is gentle on the scalp and hair, delivering vibrant, long-lasting color with added conditioning benefits. The result is smooth, shiny, and healthy-looking hair. Weight:The package contains 80 grams, suitable for a full application or touch-ups. Ingredients:Hydrogen Peroxide (for color activation)WaterCetearyl Alcohol (for conditioning and emulsification)Colorants (Light Brown shade)Conditioning AgentsFragrance Uses:Gray Coverage: Offers complete gray hair coverage with a natural light brown tone.Conditioning: Conditions your hair during the coloring process, leaving it soft and manageable.At-Home Use: Easy-to-use kit for professional results at home.Touch-ups: Ideal for refreshing roots or enhancing overall color between applications.
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from Japan.
 
Color Code-885
Bigen Hair Color & Conditioner (Light Brown) provides a soft, radiant light brown shade, perfect for enhancing your hair’s natural beauty while fully covering gray hair. Its ammonia-free formula is gentle on the scalp and hair, delivering vibrant, long-lasting color with added conditioning benefits. The result is smooth, shiny, and healthy-looking hair.
 
Weight:
The package contains 80 grams, suitable for a full application or touch-ups.
 
Ingredients:
Hydrogen Peroxide (for color activation)
Water
Cetearyl Alcohol (for conditioning and emulsification)
Colorants (Light Brown shade)
Conditioning Agents
Fragrance
 
Uses:
Gray Coverage: Offers complete gray hair coverage with a natural light brown tone.
Conditioning: Conditions your hair during the coloring process, leaving it soft and manageable.
At-Home Use: Easy-to-use kit for professional results at home.
Touch-ups: Ideal for refreshing roots or enhancing overall color between applications.
